about.title: About me
about.subtitle: I'm a member of Brackix on the Frontend team, accompanying them since its creation
about.description: I'm a Frontend Web Developer with over 2 years of experience, specialized in creating modern designs and optimizing web performance, with a focus on technologies such as HTML 5, CSS 3, JavaScript. I handle frameworks like React Native and a bit of Angular, Next and Vite, and I've also worked with desktop software like Unity, Visual Studio 2022, GODOT and MySQL, which makes me a passionate and highly qualified aspiring developer for any web development project.
